messages.content: Question: Your spaceship arrived damaged! I demand a replacement immediately.

Answer: We sincerely apologize for the inconvenience. Please send the details of your issue, including photos of the damage, to our customer service team at customer_service@stack_spaceship.com. We will prioritize your request.
Question: The delivery was delayed for two weeks! What kind of service is this?
Answer: We deeply regret the delay in delivery. Please reach out to our customer service team at customer_service@stack_spaceship.com with your order details so we can assist you further.
Question: The spaceship's control panel is malfunctioning! This is unacceptable.

Answer: We are sorry to hear about the malfunction. Please email our technical support team at customer_service@stack_spaceship.com with your purchase details, and we will resolve this issue promptly.
Question: The user manual is missing from my package! How do you expect me to operate this thing?

Answer: We apologize for the missing user manual. Please contact our customer service team at customer_service@stack_spaceship.com, and we will provide you with a digital or physical copy immediately.
Question: The fuel efficiency is far worse than advertised! I want a refund.

Answer: We are sorry to hear that the spaceship is not meeting your expectations. Please contact our customer service team at customer_service@stack_spaceship.com to discuss your concerns and explore possible resolutions.
Question: Your customer support is terrible! I've been waiting for days without a reply.
Answer: We sincerely apologize for the delay in responding. Please forward your query to customer_service@stack_spaceship.com, and we will ensure your issue is addressed as a priority.
Question: Why was I charged extra fees after purchasing the spaceship?
Answer: We apologize for any confusion regarding additional charges. Please send the details of your transaction to customer_service@stack_spaceship.com, and we will investigate this matter promptly.
Question: The engine makes a weird noise during flights. What kind of quality is this?

Answer: We apologize for the issue you're experiencing. Kindly email customer_service@stack_spaceship.com with details about the noise and your spaceship model, and our team will assist you immediately.
Question: I was promised a free upgrade, but it wasn't included in my order!

Answer: We apologize for any misunderstanding regarding your upgrade. Please contact us at customer_service@stack_spaceship.com with your order details, and we will resolve this for you as soon as possible.
Question: The warranty terms are misleading. I feel cheated.
Answer: We regret that the warranty terms were unclear. Please share your concerns with us at customer_service@stack_spaceship.com so we can provide clarification and assistance.
Question: The spaceship exterior has scratches all over. How can you sell this?
Answer: We are sorry for the condition of your delivery. Please send photos of the scratches and your order details to customer_service@stack_spaceship.com. Our team will address this issue promptly.
Question: Your sales team promised a discount, but I was charged full price!
Answer: We apologize for any discrepancies in pricing. Please contact customer_service@stack_spaceship.com with proof of the promised discount, and we will resolve this matter for you.
Question: I can't believe how poor the navigation system is! This is false advertising.
Answer: We regret that the navigation system did not meet your expectations. Please email customer_service@stack_spaceship.com with your feedback and purchase details, and our team will assist you.
Question: The seats are uncomfortable for long flights. I want a solution.
Answer: We are sorry for the inconvenience caused. Please share your concerns with our team at customer_service@stack_spaceship.com, and we will work on a solution for you.
Question: I received the wrong model! How could this happen?
Answer: We sincerely apologize for the error. Please email customer_service@stack_spaceship.com with your order details, and we will arrange for the correct model to be sent to you.
Question: My spaceship's delivery tracking shows 'lost.' What should I do?
Answer: We deeply regret the inconvenience caused. Please contact us at customer_service@stack_spaceship.com with your tracking number, and we will investigate immediately.
Question: Why don't your spaceships have the advertised color options?
Answer: We apologize for any confusion about color availability. Please email customer_service@stack_spaceship.com with your preferences, and we will assist you.
Question: The autopilot function doesn't work as expected. It's dangerous!
Answer: We take safety concerns very seriously. Please contact our technical support team at customer_service@stack_spaceship.com with your spaceship details, and we will assist you immediately.
Question: My spaceship's packaging was torn open upon delivery. What is going on?
Answer: We apologize for the condition of your delivery. Please send photos of the packaging and your order details to customer_service@stack_spaceship.com so we can address this promptly.
Question: The instructions are so unclear I can't even start the spaceship. Fix this!
Answer: We are sorry for the confusion caused by the instructions. Please reach out to customer_service@stack_spaceship.com for a detailed guide or further assistance.
